Edges-Weird -- Male Human Medieval Legendary Adventurer
Attributes (12 Points):
Agility: d12 Smarts: d10 Spirit: d10 Strength: d8 Vigor: d8
Attribute Notes:
Expert (Agility): Increased Professional effects
Professional (Agility): +2 Agility step
Master (Agility): Use d10 for Wild Die
Skills (26 Points):
Climbing: (str) d6 Notice: (sma) d8 Taunt: (sma) d6
Fighting: (agi) d8 Psionics: (sma) d6 Tracking: (sma) d8
Healing: (sma) d6 Streetwise: (sma) d8-3
Knowledge (Arcana): (sma) d8 Survival: (sma) d8
Skill Notes:
Charisma: -3 Persuasion/-3 Streetwise
Habit: -1 Charisma
Ugly: -2 Charisma
Size: 0 Deity: None
Advances: 16 Improvement Points: 36 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 14; Skill: 14
Features
Edges (1 points): Expert (Agility); Followers; Improved Tough As Nails; Martial Arts Master; Master (Agility); Master Of Arms; Professional (Agility); Sidekick; Tough As Nails; Weapon Master Hindrances: Enemy; Habit; Quirk; Ugly Human Features: Adaptable
Feature Notes:
Adaptable: +1 Edge Points
Enemy: Individual or remote group wants character eliminated
Followers: Gain 5 soldier followers
Habit: Has irritating but harmless compulsion
Quirk: Has minor compulsion that occasionally causes trouble
Sidekick: Special bond with companion
Combat
Parry: 8 (0) Cover: 0 Toughness: 9 (1) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Leather Shield: None Weapons: Axe: 1 (d8+d6); Great Axe: 1 (d8+d10); Unarmed: 1 (d8+d0+2)
Combat Notes:
Fighting Parry Modifier: +4 Parry
Improved Tough As Nails: Increased Tough As Nails effects
Martial Arts Master: +2 Unarmed damage
Master Of Arms: Increased Weapon Master effects
Tough As Nails: +2 Toughness
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +4
Weapon Master: +2 Parry
Great Axe Parry Modifier: -1 Parry when wielded
Notes
Validation Errors:
Edge Allocation: 1 available vs. 10 allocated
Improvement Allocation: 36 available vs. 28 allocated
Martial Arts Master Edge: Requires advances (currently 16) >= 16, improved martial artist feature and fighting skill (currently 8) >= 12
Weapon Master Edge: Requires advances (currently 16) >= 16 and fighting skill (currently 8) >= 12
